doc.title: The Englishman and the Mafia
doc.plot: This film is the true crime story of the only Englishman to ever be made into the American Mafia. His story is an unforgettable journey set in the 1960's through Violence and Music starting on the Isle of Wight, stopping off in London and ending up in New York. This film is based on the best selling book by renown author John Pearson "One of the family - The Englishman and The Mafia".
